description: The GTmetrix API offers developers an easy way to utilize GTmetrix's performance testing service. Using the GTmetrix API, you can integrate performance testing into your development environment or into your application.The GTmetrix API is based on the Web Testing Framework (WTF) Testing Service API which is RESTful API.if you have any questions or comments about the API, or if you end up using it in a cool and interesting way.
title: GTmetrix
